response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This product, which I believe could be transformative for you, comes with a rich history and unparalleled quality. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $2,000,000. This is a significant investment, but I am confident that its value will only grow over time. I look forward to discussing this further with you and understanding how this product could enhance your life or business.", "product_price": 2000000}
